plot outline: An actor and a playwright becomes disgusted with contemporary drama trends of the time and resumes staying at his ancestral house with his helper and his mad love interest. He spends his time thinking about his disloyal wife who left him and talking with Rasu, the helper who mechanically gives company to his master. His sister in law comes to stay with him along with her son Kanu after the husband died and soon shares her bed with the playwright.
